definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[נַפְתֻּחִים]] n.pr.loc. Ge 10:13 = 1Ch 1:11 (LXX Nefqal(i)eim, but LXXL in Ch Nefqwseim; = pªtªmh‘, the northern land, i.e. Lower Egypt, acc. to Brugsch:Hierogl, WB. Suppl. 633, and esp. Erman:ZAW x (1890), 118, 119 rdg. [[פתמחים]]. Other conj. v. Di:Gn.
